Articles.Content: Is pue enviromental visual enhancments od still mantained, or do i need to download one of these packs like interstellar?
EVE works fine, no packs required.
Well, it says its for 0.24 in release thread so i thought its wont work with newest version.
no, it works fine. There's nothing that can break it. Except planetshine, that breaks the city lights.

> 
> Well, it says its for 0.24 in release thread so i thought its wont work with newest version.

Next time you run into this problem just try it. Just don't do it in your active career but instead use a fresh sandbox. If a mod doesn't work simply remove it. Nothing gained, nothing lost.

> 
> no, it works fine. There's nothing that can break it. Except planetshine, that breaks the city lights.

? I'm running EVE and Planetshine and I still get city lights.
It works fine for some people. If your game keeps crashing, remove EVE and see if it continues.
